DefaultEvent.Description: These pinnaces don't sail far from their hidden harbours, but here's something at the back of the hold -
DefaultEvent.Name: Lean pickings

ChildBranches.Name: Loot and scuttle her
ChildBranches.Description: She's a vile old vessel, and these zees aren't safe. Take what you can and move on.

DefaultEvent.Description: These pirates have done perverse and perilous things to their engine to keep it running at such a pace. You probably don't want to do those things. But you can learn from them...
DefaultEvent.Name: Desperate innovations

ChildBranches.Name: Record any Observations
ChildBranches.Description: If you've gathered enough, you may learn something...

SuccessEvent.Description: When you next return to London, return to your Lodgings to claim your prize money...
SuccessEvent.Name: Awaiting your pleasure

DefaultEvent.Description: $Iron Republic -> アイアン・リパブリック$Your prize is never seen again. Perhaps a heptycheer devours your crew. Perhaps they devour each other. Perhaps they betray you and sail it to the Iron Republic, where laws cannot follow.
DefaultEvent.Name: Into the darkness

ChildBranches.Name: Send her home with a prize crew
ChildBranches.Description: Two zailors should be enough for a skeleton crew, and she's fast enough to avoid most trouble.

Description: The ship is yours! What will you do with her?
Name: You've defeated a Crack Pirate Steam-Pinnace
